downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Managing User Identities with Forefront Identity Manager 2010
downloadDescription: Create a test lab using FIM 2010 to manage uers identities
detailsSection: Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010 is a comprehensive solution for managing identities, credentials, and identity-based access policies across heterogeneous environments.  This document contains step-by-step instructions for one possible way of managing users in a test lab environment.
systemRequirementsSection:
Operating Systems: 
Windows Server 2008 R2 
Microsoft SQL Server 2008 with Service Pack 2 
Microsoft Exchange 2010 with Service Pack 1 
Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010 
Update 1 for Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010
installInstructionSection: Click Download to download this document.
